title: Supernatural Monetary System - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Supernatural   Xuanhuan
tags: Business Management   Cultivation   Fantasy World   Fast Cultivation   Fast Learner   Game Elements   Genius Protagonist   Immortals   Level System   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Mysterious Past   Schemes And Conspiracies   Special Abilities   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Yiren Qianjun   一人千军
description:
Yu Sheng is a common man and boasts a boring life before becoming the owner of almighty Supernatural Monetary System. This unique system can help him to acquire everything in the world only by recharging money. To gain more desired things and to succeed, Yu Sheng has to earn much money with a crazy method.

Facing all kinds of various temptations, what will Yu Sheng choose? What secrets are hiding behind the system? Who has made this system, and what is his purpose? What is the system planning for itself? Where are the previous hosts of this system?

Yu Sheng has deeply got stuck in this chessboard. Will he remain a chess piece and be at the mercy of others, or become the manipulator who controls the game?>
